properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 8:46AM CST until January 15 at 10:30PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Illinois...

Iroquois River near Foresman affecting Newton County
Iroquois River at Iroquois affecting Iroquois County
Iroquois River at Rensselaer affecting Jasper County

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 24-48 hours into the future.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Iroquois River near Foresman, or from Near I-65 east of Foresman
downstream to near US-41 north of Kentland.
* from this afternoon to Wednesday evening.
* At  745 AM Sunday the stage was 17.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late this afternoon and
continue to rise to near 19.5 feet by early Tuesday morning.
* Impact...At 18.5 feet...County road 1000S north of the river near
Brook.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.
